```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggridges)
```


Load data
```{r,message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
merged_data = 
  read_csv("data/Merged_expectation.csv", show_col_types = FALSE)

merged_data
```
```{r}
merged_data_bmi_alcohol =
merged_data %>% 
  select(year, life_expect, bmi, alcohol) %>% 
  filter(year > 2012)
```



```{r}
par(mfrow = c(2, 2)) # Create a 2 x 2 plotting matrix
# The next 4 plots created will be plotted next to each other

# 2013
merged_data_bmi_alcohol %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = activity, y = activity_counts, color = day)) +
  geom_smooth(se= FALSE)+
  labs(
    title = "24-hour activity time courses",
    x = "Minutes_from_midnight(minute)",
    y = "Activity counts"
  

# 2014
hist(rnorm(100))

# 2015
hist(rnorm(100))
# 2016
hist(rnorm(100))
```
